titles.title: A resolution commemorating the 100th anniversary of the discovery of sickle cell disease by Dr. James B. Herrick.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: 11/18/2010--Passed Senate without amendment. Commemorates the 100th anniversary of the discovery of sickle cell disease.Recognizes the biomedical research community's contributions to improvement in its diagnosis and treatment.
